mission-gov-refactor.instruction: Decompose the monolithic government entity into a Facade/Component structure as per WO-144.
mission-gov-refactor.title: WO-144: Government Structure Refactor

mission-fiscal-policy.instruction: Implement a progressive tax system with FiscalPolicyManager as an automatic stabilizer as per WO-145.
mission-fiscal-policy.title: WO-145: Progressive Tax System

mission-monetary-policy.instruction: Implement Taylor Rule-based monetary policy with MonetaryPolicyManager as per WO-146.
mission-monetary-policy.title: WO-146: Monetary Policy & Taylor Rule

mission-soft-landing-verify.instruction: Create the soft landing verification suite and report generation as per WO-147.
mission-soft-landing-verify.title: WO-147: Soft Landing Verification Suite
